Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial on the Impact of Distension Pressure on Long Saphenous Vein Grafts in CABG

Trial_Design.evidence: In this prospective, single-center randomised controlled trial

Intervention.evidence: randomised into non-distended (group A) and distended (group B) groups

Objective.evidence: This study investigates the effect of unregulated distension pressure on LSVG endothelium.

Method_Outcome.evidence: Histological and CD31 immunohistochemical analyses assessed endothelial cell loss.

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: Randomisation was computer-generated, and allocation was concealed.

Number_Randomised.evidence: 21 paired vein samples from CABG patients

Result_Outcome.evidence: Distended veins showed significantly higher endothelial cell loss (31.95% ± 31.31) compared to non-distended veins (11.67% ± 28.65) (p = 0.034).
